column4: Hey guys? Is there a way to use Rhinoceros(the 3d modeler) on ubuntu?
is it in the ubutnu repo
the ubuntu whato? New to ubuntu btw
take a look at the pm from ubotu
it tells you how to use the package manager, for which you can search for the package you want
I dont' need that
I made a typo the first time
Haha, thanks. Thats why i sent it back to you, show ya what i got
How does that help install Rhino? I have a CD for it for Windows
I said see if there is a version in the repos. If you want to use the windows version you will have to use "wine"
that should work
check ubotus message again ;)
try it under wine
What are the advantages of an actual IRC client over Pidgin? This is really my first IRC room I've been in, I don't know anything about IRC really...
just more features in native irc clients
depends how much you want to interact
Coupla examples?
for example if you are an operater, you can bind functions, that sort of thing
Ah, ok. Any suggestions on which I should get if I do get one? I'm kinda fond of Pidgin and Windows Live messengers interface, similar would be great
if you like the interface, stick with pidgin
its all personal preference, try them, see what you like
ok, will do
